<The Waynflete Professorships

--------------------
Text: Waynflete Professorship:  These professorships are statutory professorships of the University, that is, they are professorships established in the university's regulations, and which are by those regulations attached to Magdalen College in particular.

Text: Waynflete Professorship:  The three science professorships were created following the recommendation of the University Commission in 1857, in recognition of William of Waynflete's lifetime support of science.
